summary: An expert spell that allows you to take on the form of a paladin of holy light.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]TWNXI89Ax_s[/youtube]

Paladin form, An expert restoration spell that gives you 
A holy cloak that does similar to fire cloak.
Paladin Regeneration that heals you over time.
Health Fortification.
Block Fortification
Heavy Armor Fortification.
Light Armor Fortification.
One and two handed fortification 5%.
All for 2 minutes. two handed spell
author: thelawfull
